articles.title: Kim Jong Il Watches Combined Exercise of KPA Unit 567
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Watches Combined Exercise of KPA Unit 567
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- General Secreatry Kim Jong Il watched a combined exercise of Large Combined Unit 567 of the KPA staged on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 After receiving a salute, he mounted an observation platform to be briefed on the plan of the exercise and watch it.
					
					 After watching the exercise the unit conducted at a high level by fully embodying the Juche-oriented war method, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that all the servicepersons of the unit are fully prepared politically and ideologically and in military technique to beat back any surprise attack of the enemy in time and defend the socialist country as firm as a rock.
					
					 He highly appreciated the success made in the exercise and set forth highly important tasks which would serve as guidelines for further bolstering up the KPA into ever-victorious revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 The servicepersons of the heroic KPA have grown not only to be a death-defying corps of human bombs and vanguard fighters of Songun revolution ready to dedicate their youth and life to the Party and the leader, the country and people but to be powerful revolutionary armed forces equipped with modern offensive and defensive means, he said, adding that the socialist system centered on the popular masses will always remain shining in the DPRK as an invulnerable fortress as it has this matchless great army, a heir to the tradition of the anti-Japanese armed struggle. 
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the servicepersons of the KPA would firmly protect the security of the country and the people's happiness with arms.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice-Marshal Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and minister of the People's Armed Forces, Ri Yong Mu and O Kuk Ryol, vice-chairmen of the NDC, KPA General Ri Yong Ho, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, KPA General Kim Jong Gak, member of the NDC and first vice-director of the KPA General Political Department, KPA Vice-Marshal Kim Il Chol, member of the NDC, and other commanding officers of the KPA and Secretaries of the C.C., the WPK Jon Pyong Ho, Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam and other senior officials of the C.C., the WPK. 
					
					 The exercise was watched by deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, those in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, pubic heath and media here and commanding officers of various units of the KPA.

articles.title: Democratic Congo Labor Camp Presents Highest Prizes
articles.content:
Democratic Congo Labor Camp Presents Highest Prizes
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il were presented with the highest prizes of labor camp of the Working Citizens' Association of Democratic Congo on the occasion of the Day of the Sun. 
					 They were handed to an official concerned by visiting President of the association Rohekele Andre on Tuesday.

articles.title: Floral Basket from Palestinian Chief
articles.content:
Floral Basket from Palestinian Chief
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by Mahmoud Abbas, chief of the Palestinian National Authority, on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The floral basket was conveyed to an official concerned by Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan on Tuesday.

articles.title: Floral Basket from International Kim Il Sung Foundation
articles.content:
Floral Basket from International Kim Il Sung Foundation
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by Johnny Hon, chairman of the International Kim Il Sung Foundation, on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 It was handed to an official concerned on Tuesday.

articles.title: Gift from Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Gift from Chinese Delegation
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by a delegation of the China Institutes of Contemporary International Relations on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned on Tuesday by Ji Zhiye, vice-president of the China institutes who is heading the delegation.

articles.title: Gifts from IIJI
articles.content:
Gifts from IIJI
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and gifts by a delegation and delegates of organizations for the study of the Juche idea on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The floral basket was handed over to an official concerned by Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea on Tuesday.
					
					 Kim Jong Il also received gifts from the delegation and foreigners.
					
					 Among them are Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, Harish Gupta, director general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea, Ramon Jimenez Lopez, secretary general of the Latin American Institute of the Juche Idea, Anatoli Dolgachev, head of the delegation of the Vladivostok Association for the Study of the Songun Policy of Russia, Lyne Sinyodyium, member of the French Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the delegation of the Ukrainian Independence Federation headed by Babych Bogdana.
					
					 The gifts were respectively conveyed to officials concerned.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Visit Kimilsungia Festival
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Visit Kimilsungia Festival
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of foreign embassies here visited the venue of the 12th Kimilsungia Festival on Tuesday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The guests looked round potted Kimilsungias in full bloom with deep emotion.
					
					 Hossam Moshir, cultural councilor of the Egyptian embassy, wrote in the visitor's book that they recollected the revolutionary career of President Kim Il Sung while visiting the venue. We hope that the DPRK would further prosper under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, he added.

articles.title: China Wushu Donates Equipment and Sports Goods
articles.content:
China Wushu Donates Equipment and Sports Goods
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Wushu paraphernalia was donated to the Korean Wushu Association by the Chinese Wushu Association.
					 A ceremony of donating them took place at the Taekwon-Do Hall on Tuesday. 
					
					 Present there were Hwang Pong Yong, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, who doubles as chairman of the Korean Martial Art Federation, members of the Korean Wushu Association, officials concerned and Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and officials of his embassy.
					
					 The paraphernalia was conveyed to the Korean Wushu Association to be followed by speeches.

articles.title: Executive Committee of IIJI Board of Directors Meets
articles.content:
Executive Committee of IIJI Board of Directors Meets
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The 12th meeting of the Executive Committee of the Board of Directors of the International Institute of the Juche Idea was held here on Tuesday.
					 Present at the meeting were Director-General Vishwanath and Secretary General Kenichi Ogami of the IIJI, Director General of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea Harish Gupta, Secretary General of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea Kamwiziku Octave, Secretary General of the Latin American Institute of the Juche Idea Ramon Jimenez Lopez, Secretary General of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea Matteo Carbonelli and other members of the executive committee.
					
					 The meeting reviewed the successes made in the activities of the Juche idea study organizations after the 11th meeting of the said committee and set forth the orientation of its work up to 2012.
					
					 A resolution of the 12th meeting of the Executive Committee of the IIJI Board of Directors was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations Here
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Here
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Foreign delegations arrived here by train and air on Tuesday to commemorate the Day of the Sun.
					 They are a delegation of the Mongolian Centre for the Study of Juche led by Chairman N. Bold, a delegation of the Forum for Self-Reliance Studies of Nepal led by Chairman Subash Kaji Shrestha, a delegation of the Japan Society for Study of Kimilsungism led by Saito Masahiro, a delegation of Kuwait University led by Abdul-Reda Assiri, rector of the College of Social Sciences under it, and a Mongolian delegation for commemorating the Day of the Sun led by D. Michka, general director of the HUM Company Ltd.
					
					 Luis Banguera Estupinan, acting mayor of Esmeraldas City, Esmeraldas Province of Ecuador, arrived here by air on the same day.
					
					 Also arriving here Tuesday were the tourist visiting group of China.

articles.title: Dental Hospital Opens
articles.content:
Dental Hospital Opens
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Public Health General Dental Hospital was opened in the DPRK with due ceremony on Tuesday.
					 The hospital has all specialized treatment rooms, auxiliary diagnostic rooms, sick-rooms, a dental materials factory, general lecture room for education, laboratories, etc. and is fully equipped with modern treatment facilities including general dental appliances and welfare service amenities. 
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Premier Kim Yong Il, Secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Choe Thae Bok, Minister of Public Health Choe Chang Sik, Minister of Capital City Construction Kim Ung Gwan, officials and employees of the hospital, builders and working people in the city.

articles.title: Korean Art Gallery Rebuilt
articles.content:
Korean Art Gallery Rebuilt
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Korean Art Gallery was opened to visitors with due ceremony on Monday after being rebuilt to meet the requirements of the era of Songun.
					 On display at the gallery, established on August 11, Juche 37 (1948), are fine art works dealing with the brilliant revolutionary activities and noble virtues of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu, excellent works on the glorious course of the developing Juche-based fine art and a large number of fine art works on the brilliant culture and time-honored traditions of the Korean nation.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were officials concerned, employees of the gallery, creators and builders and the general manager of the Beijing Ji Shengchang Culture Co., Ltd.
					
					 An Tong Chun, minister of Culture, said in his opening address that officials and employees of the gallery contributed to enriching the treasure-house of national cultural heritages through display of fine art works listed as national treasure and intensified academic researches.
					
					 He noted that creators and builders successfully finished the project for reconstructing the gallery in a short span of time, true to the lofty intention of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He also said that the said general manager made a contribution to the completion of the project.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony its participants looked round the exhibits.

articles.title: Remembrance Meeting Held by Agricultural Workers
articles.content:
Remembrance Meeting Held by Agricultural Workers
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting "President Kim Il Sung without Parallel in the World" of agricultural workers was held in front of the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum on Monday on the occasion of the 98th anniversary of birth of Kim Il Sung.
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, officials of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and other agricultural workers in Pyongyang.
					
					 Han Kyong Song, vice-chairman of the C.C., the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea, said in his speech that Kim Il Sung realized the age-old desire of the peasants after the liberation of Korea and made tireless efforts for the development of the nation's agriculture, walking along lanes between ridges of fields till the last moments of his great life.
					
					 Put on the stage were mixed sextets "Let's Sing of the Day of the Sun" and "Song of Mangyongdae", female chorus "Song of Plowing" and mixed duet "The Leader is without Parallel in the World."
					
					 Ri Yong Hwa from Jangsan-ri, Ryongchon County, Sin Ok Son, chairwoman of the management board of the Hwasong Vegetable Co-op Farm in Ryongsong District, and Min Kyong Nam, work-team leader of the Chongsan Co-op Farm in Kangso District, told with deep emotion stories about what great loving care and trust the President showed for agricultural workers when he was visiting their farms for field guidance.

articles.title: April Spring People's Art Festival Marks First-day
articles.content:
April Spring People's Art Festival Marks First-day
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- First-day performances of the Second April Spring People's Art Festival took place at theatres here on Monday before full houses.
					 Performances were given by the Mansudae Art Troupe and art troupes of North Phyongan, Kangwon and Ryanggang provinces at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre, the State Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theatre, the Phibada Opera Troupe, art troupes of South Hwanghae and Jagang provinces and the art troupe of Koreans in Japan at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre and the Cinema and Radio Musical Company and art troupes of South and North Hamgyong and South Phyongan provinces at the Pyongyang International Cinema House.
					
					 The stage of the Central Youth Hall was devoted to the State Folk Art Troupe, art troupes of North Hwanghae Province and cities of Nampho and Kaesong, art troupes of Koreans in China and the International United Confederation of Koreans and members of art squads of the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex and the Wonhwa Co-operative Farm in Phyongwon County while that of the Yun I Sang Concert Hall was dedicated to the orchestras of the Yun I Sang Music Institute and Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory, Pyongyang Music School and the art troupe of Koreans in the U.S.
					
					 Artistes of the Pyongyang Puppet Company and art troupes of North Phyongan and Jagang provinces presented puppet shows and dramas at the Ponghwa Art Theatre while those of the Pyongyang Circus and art organizations in different parts of the country performed acrobatic numbers at the Pyongyang Circus Theatre.
					
					 The stage of the Cultural Hall of the Ministry of Railways was devoted to art squads of Kangwon Province, the Ministry of Capital City Construction and the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and that of the music hall of Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory to the itinerant art squads of the Tobacco Complex, Thaethan County and the Pyongyang Railway Bureau and that of the Hall of Women to members of itinerant art squads of Sunchon City, the Pyongyang Farm and the Taehung Youth Hero Mine.
					
					 Members of art squads of the Pyongyang Underground Shop, the Phyonghwa Co-operative Farm in Kaesong City and the February 8 Vinalon Complex performed at the People's Palace of Culture and those of the Nyongbyon Silk Mill and the Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory at the Central Hall of Workers.
					
					 The performers enthusiastically sang of the glorious revolutionary career and immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung whom the Korean nation acclaimed and held in high esteem for the first time in its history spanning thousands of years and successfully represented the faith and will to open a new history of prosperity in the socialist homeland under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Among the audiences were members of the organizing committee of the festival, working people, youth and students in the city, foreign guests and overseas compatriots.
					
					 The performances go on.

articles.title: National Fine Arts Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Fine Arts Exhibition Opens
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A national fine arts exhibition on the theme of the revolutionary traditions was opened at the Pyongyang International Cultural Centre with due ceremony on Tuesday to commemorate the 98th anniversary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display in the venue of the exhibition are fine art works dealing with the undying feats the President performed by establishing the glorious revolutionary traditions in the crucible of the great anti-Japanese war. Among them are oil painting "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung proclaiming the birth of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army", Korean painting "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung commanding the battle in Taehongdan" and graphic painting "Commander is also the son of people".
					
					Also there are acryl painting "Great loving care" and oil painting "The battle site in spring" and other works on the noble leadership traits of General Secretary Kim Jong Il successfully pushing ahead with the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Korean paintings "Capture of arms" and "Let us wipe out the Japanese imperialists by the unity of the Korean nation" created during the anti-Japanese armed struggle and art works depicting Kim Chaek, An Gil and other revolutionary fighters who were intensely loyal to the President help the visitors deeply grasp the indomitable revolutionary spirit and optimism of the revolutionary forerunners.
					
					 After an opening speech was made by Minister of Culture An Tong Chun, its participants looked round fine art works on display.
					
					 On the same day the Songhwa Fine Art Exhibition was opened to commemorate the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: National Student Basketball Tournament Held
articles.content:
National Student Basketball Tournament Held
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The national student basketball tournament took place in Phyongsong from April 5 to 12 to commemorate the Day of the Sun.
					 The tournament was held in a round-robin and knockout basis with involvement of 26 teams selected from universities and colleges.
					
					 Men and women players of Kim Il Sung University came first in the university group and men players of Hamhung College of Electricity and women players of Pyongyang College of Statistics in the college group.

articles.title: New Flotation Machine Developed
articles.content:
New Flotation Machine Developed
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the Research Institute of Mining Machinery under the State Academy of Sciences have developed a new kind of pillar flotation machine. 
					 The air machine makes it possible to collect useful minerals contained in low-grade ores and residue and enhance actual concentration rate. 
					
					 It, which needs a small area for its installation and has a large capacity, is low in both the manufacture and operation expenses. It is also less in electricity consumption and much longer in serviceable life than the existing one.
					
					 It is also available for slag concentration at thermal power stations. 
					
					 The new machine has already been introduced at dressing plants.

articles.title: Pig iron, Steel Production Up
articles.content:
Pig iron, Steel Production Up
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Pig iron and steel production has been steadily increased in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, a gigantic metallurgical base in the northern part of the country, topped their assignments for the first quarter of the year -- 108.7 percent in the total industrial output value and 101.9, 102.1 and 103.6 percent in pig iron, steel and rolled steel production respectively.
					
					 The Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex, too, fulfilled its first quarterly plan ahead of schedule.
					
					 The Chollima Steel Complex, Songjin Steel Complex and the Chongjin Steel Plant are also playing a big role in the country's steel production.
					
					 The ferrous metallurgical bases of the country are supplied with high-grade iron ores by the Musan Mining Complex, Unryul Mine, Jaeryong Mine and other iron mines.
					
					 The Juche-based steel-making system established at steel producers some time ago opened a splendid vista for developing the country's metallurgical industry considerably.

articles.title: Japan's Moves to Grab Tok Islets under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Japan's Moves to Grab Tok Islets under Fire in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- 220 civic and social organizations in the Pusan area including the Council of Pusan Civic Organizations in south Korea at a rally held near the consulate of Japan in Pusan on April 9 strongly protested against the Japanese government's brazen-faced moves to grab Tok Islets. 
					 The organizations said at the rally that shortly ago the Japanese government finally passed through screening the textbooks of primary schools in which Tok Islets are marked as part of its territory, adding this is, in fact, a dastardly intention to infuse "dominion over Tok Islets" into all the students in Japan through primary education. 
					
					 They stressed that Tok Islets are evidently part of the inviolable territory of the Korean nation from historical and geographical viewpoints and there can be neither concession nor compromise.
					
					 The organizations strongly demanded the Japanese authorities immediately retract the results of textbook screening and apologize to the Korean nation for their action.

articles.title: US Forces' Killings of Iraqi Civilians Assailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
US Forces' Killings of Iraqi Civilians Assailed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The preparatory committee of the Solidarity for Peace against War in south Korea issued a statement on April 8 in connection with the disclosure of murder of civilians by the U.S. forces in Iraq.
					 The statement recalled an Internet site on April 5 disclosed the fact that the GIs who were aboard a helicopter gunship over Baghdad on July 12, 2007 indiscriminately fired at civilians and at a truck running to rescue them, killing 12 of them and wounding two children.
					
					 This mass killing of civilians clearly proved that the U.S. assertion that U.S. forces are present in Iraq for its reconstruction is nothing but sheer hypocrisy, the statement noted. 
					
					 The killings of civilians will go on in Iraq as long as the U.S. forces remain there, it held, demanding the U.S. pull its forces for aggression out of that country.

articles.title: Actions on Japan's Discrimination against Korean Schools Urged
articles.content:
Actions on Japan's Discrimination against Korean Schools Urged
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) - Organizations under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans in different parts of Japan and members of civic organizations of Japan are carrying on their solidarity actions demanding the Japanese government retract its measure for discriminating against the Korean schools.
					  Officials of the Osaka Headquarters of Chongryon, students of Korean schools and their parents and citizens of Japan affiliated to the society for supporting the Korean schools scattered leaflets at major stations in Osaka and conducted street information service on April 8.
					
					 Declaring that they would not stop the struggle till the Korean schools are included in the "tuition-free program", the protesters called upon Japanese citizens to positively join in the actions to force the government to retract the unreasonable discriminating measure.
					
					 On the same day, those concerned of the Educational Society of Kobe Korean High School and members of "For Peace through Dialogue! the Kobe Network for Japan-DPRK relations", a Japanese organization, visited the Hall of Members of the House of Representatives and the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan and urged them to roll back the policy of discrimination against the Korean schools. 
					
					 Noting that excluding the Korean schools from the "tuition-free program for senior high schools" means discrimination against the Korean students, they called for carrying on their actions demanding the Japanese government retract its unreasonable measure to discriminate against the Korean schools. Then they handed to them written requests addressed to the Democratic Party of Japan and the minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology in demand of the drop of the above-said policy of discrimination. 
					
					 On April 2, officials of the Kawanishi Chapter of Chongryon, the Hyogo Prefectural Headquarters of the Women's Union and the Kobe Korean High School met the leader of the Social-Democratic Party of Japan, requesting him to cooperate in the efforts to include the Korean schools in the "tuition-free program" at an early date.
					
					 That day, a meeting took place in protest against the discriminative measure against the Korean schools with Koreans in Japan and Japanese citizens in Nara Prefecture attending. 
					
					 The Tochigi Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon got in touch with Dietmen, members of local self-governing bodies, regional friendly organizations, public organizations and trade unions, requesting them to help in the actions demanding the Japanese government roll back the above-mentioned policy of discrimination from late February through March. 
					
					 The Tochigi Prefectural Women's Society for Solidarity with the Korean Women and others sent written requests to the Japanese prime minister and the above-said minister of Japan urging them not to exclude the Korean schools from the "tuition-free program".

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Egyptian
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Egyptian
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Wahid Al Uksouri, chairman of the Arab Socialist Party of Egypt, made public a statement on April 5 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 Stressing that President Kim Il Sung is the prominent great man without parallel in history, the statement said:
					
					 His was the life of a distinguished thinker-theoretician as he founded the guiding idea for the era of independence and showed the road ahead of the Korean people and the world progressives. It was also the life of a great statesman as he defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialisms in one generation and turned Korea, once backward and poverty-stricken, into a powerful socialist country independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 Kim Il Sung enjoys boundless reverence from the Korean people and the world progressives for he brought epoch-making miracles and victories, weathering out all turns and twists and hardships of history with his firm faith and iron will.
					
					His cause is being creditably carried forward by Genral Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We express full support and solidarity with the Korean people in the efforts to realize the cause of the President under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il and wish the friendly Korean people greater success.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Off Press in Pakistan
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Off Press in Pakistan
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Achieve the Great Unity of Our Nation" was brought out in pamphlet by the Victorial Publishing House in Pakistan.
					 The work, published on August 1, Juche 80 (1991), clarifies the idea that the driving force for national reunification is the Korean nation and the tasks and ways for achieving the great unity of the whole nation.
					
					 A ceremony of releasing the work took place at the publishing house on April 6.

articles.title: Day of Sun Commemorated in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Day of Sun Commemorated in Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea issued bulletin captioned "The sun is eternal" on April 5 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 An article of the bulletin said: The Korean people have designated as the Day of the Sun April 15 when President Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea, was born. His august name means the sun. He is, indeed, like the sun.
					
					 Stressing that the President clearly indicated the road for humankind in the era of independence to follow, the bulletin referred to the brisk activities for the study and dissemination of the Juche idea being conducted on a worldwide scale.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung lies in state at the Kumsusan Memorial Palace called "house of the sun."
					
					 The Korean people hold him in high esteem as the eternal President of the DPRK. 
					
					 As the sun is eternal, the President is always alive with humankind.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- One day in June Juche 58 (1969) the Political Committee of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea met, presided by President Kim Il Sung, to discuss preparations for a new school year.
					 At the session the President underscored the need to give priority to fully providing paper for textbooks.
					
					 He then said textbooks should be prepared with quality paper to make the schoolchildren pleased with them before the beginning of study at schools.
					
					 He also took measures to organize national, provincial, city and county preparatory committees for the new school year and let leading officials undertake the committees.
					
					 Concluding the session, the President told the participants that the session was tantamount to a meeting of schoolchildren's parents.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il visita la nueva biblioteca electronica
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il visita la nueva biblioteca electronica
Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, realizo la visita de orientacion sobre la biblioteca electronica nuevamente construida en la Universidad Kim Il Sung.
					  Al recorrer por varias horas las salas de lectura, las de lecciones de larga distancia y otras partes del interior de la biblioteca, se entero detalladamente del estado de construccion y de equipos tecnicos y se mostro muy satisfecho por la construccion magnifica de esta moderna biblioteca que satisface las demandas de la era de la economia basada en la intelectualidad.
					
					  Diciendo que en cada componente de la biblioteca acondicionada maravillosamente esta reflejada la calida devocion patriotica de los constructores militares, evaluo altamente los meritos de los oficiales y soldados de la unidad que vinieron cumpliendo siempre el papel de vanguardia en la construccion socialista.
					
					  Al ver la figura feliz de los estudiantes enfrascados en la investigacion cientifica en la biblioteca beneficiandose a sus anchas del ventajoso regimen de educacion socialista, se puso muy complacido por poder legar a las generaciones venideras esa creacion de eterna duracion que no tendra defectos hasta en el remoto futuro.
					
					  Los estudiantes infinitamente fieles al partido y la revolucion son los tesoros del pais, dijo y destaco la necesidad de prestar siempre profunda atencion al estudio y la vida de ellos.
					
					  A fin de levantar mas edificaciones de la epoca del Songun conforme al gusto y la demanda esteticos de nuestro pueblo, hay que explorar e inventar activamente las formas arquitectonicas nuevas, originales y tipicas y renovar incesantemente el caracter plastico y artistico de la arquitectura.
					
					  Mientras recorria la exposicion permanente de los exitos pedagogicos y cientificos de la universidad, evaluo altamente las brillantes proezas de ella diciendo que al formar a numerosos talentosos revolucionarios durante mas de 60 anos, la Universidad Kim Il Sung cumplio el papel protagonico en la materializacion de la orientacion de formacion de los cuadros nacionales y la de intelectualizacion de toda la sociedad y realizo grandes meritos al hacer enorme aporte al desarrollo cientifico-tecnico del pais desplegando activamente la investigacion cientifica.
					
					  Se reunio con los profesores e investigadores con extraordinarios meritos en la educacion y la investigacion cientifica y les estimulo cordialmente.
					
					Despues de ver la competencia de los universitarios en el centro de natacion, presencio el panorama de la villa universitaria extendida en la zona del monte Ryongnam.
					
					   Al contemplar los establecimientos docentes como  los edificios con aulas, el albergue, la biblioteca, el palacio de deportes construidos de manera ordenada en torno al monte Ryongnam, destaco que esta prestigiosa Universidad Kim Il Sung, supremo centro de la educacion autoctona, deviene un gran orgullo de nuestro partido y pueblo.
					
					  Esta universidad deviene el valioso patrimonio por la prosperidad nacional que debe ser transmitida de generacion en generacion, dijo y presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para el fortalecimiento y el desarrollo de ella.
					
					  En esta ocasion el Dirigente fue acompanado por los secretarios del CC del PTC Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Il y Kim Yang Gon y otros cuadros directivos del CC del Partido.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores de jefe de autoridad palestina
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores de jefe de autoridad palestina
Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio un cesto de flores que con motivo del Dia del Sol le dedicara el jefe de la Autoridad Nacional de Palestina, Mahmoud Abbas.
					El embajador palestino en Corea, Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, lo entrego el dia 13 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il reciben premios del Congo Democratico
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il reciben premios del Congo Democratico 
Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ATCC) -- El Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibieron los maximos premios del sector obrero que con motivo del Dia del Sol (15 de abril, cumpleanos del Presidente Kim Il Sung), les otorgara la Asociacion de Ciudadanos Obreros del Congo Democratico.
					Los premios fueron entregados el dia 13 a un funcionario coreano por el presidente de la citada asociacion, Rohekele Andre, quien esta de visita en Corea.

articles.title: Entidad china dona aparatos deportivos a Corea
articles.content:
Entidad china dona aparatos deportivos a Corea
						
Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ATCC) -- La Asociacion de Wushu de China dono a la entidad homologa de Corea los equipos para el entrenamiento de este arte marcial. 
					La ceremonia de donacion tuvo lugar el dia 13 en el capitalino Centro de Taekwondo.
					
					Al acto asistieron Hwang Pong Yong, presidente del Comite Coreano de Taekwondo y de la Federacion de Arte Marcial de Corea, los miembros de la Asociacion de Wushu de Corea y los funcionarios correspondientes, asi como el embajador Liu Hongcai y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica china en Corea. 
					
					Luego de la donacion hubo discursos.

articles.title: Inaugurado Hospital Estomatologico del MINSAP
articles.content:
Inaugurado Hospital Estomatologico del MINSAP
						
Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurado el Hospital Estomatologico del Ministerio de Salud Publica de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en una ceremonia realizada este martes.
					El hospital dispone de las salas de tratamiento especializado por secciones, las de diagnosis auxiliar, las de hospitalizacion, la fabrica de materiales estomatologicos, la sala de leccion general y laboratorios con fines educativos, etc.
					
					Ademas, tiene suficientes instalaciones modernas de tratamiento como el aparato de terapia estomatologica universal, aparte de los establecimientos de servicios publicos. 
					
					En la ceremonia de inauguracion participaron el primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, Kim Yong Il, el secretario del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok, el ministro de Salud Publica Choe Chang Sik, el ministro de Construccion de la Capital Kim Ung Gwan, los funcionarios y empleados del hospital, los constructores y trabajadores capitalinos.

articles.title: Inaugurado el reconstruido Museo de Bellas Artes de Corea
articles.content:
Inaugurado el reconstruido Museo de Bellas Artes de Corea
						
Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurado el dia 12 el Museo de Bellas Artes de Corea reconstruido conforme a la demanda de la epoca del Songun.
					En este museo fundado el 11 de agosto del 37 (1948) de la Era Juche estan exhibidas las obras de bellas artes alusivas a las brillantes actividades revolucionarias de los 3 generales del monte Paektu y sus nobles rasgos, las otras maestras que muestran el desarrollo de las bellas artes autoctonas y numerosas piezas que dan a conocer la brillante cultura y la larga tradicion de la nacion coreana.
					
					En el acto inaugural participaron los funcionarios correspondientes, empleados del museo, creadores y constructores, asi como el director general de la Compania Limitada de Cultura Beijing-Ji Shengchang de China.
					
					El ministro de Cultura An Tong Chun, en su discurso inaugural, senalo que los funcionarios y los empleados del museo exhibieron las obras con el valor de patrimonio nacional y contribuyeron a enriquecer la tesoreria de patrimonios culturales nacionales profundizando la investigacion cientifica.
					
					Subrayo que los creadores y los constructores terminaron con exito en un corto tiempo la obra de reconstruccion y reparacion del museo en fiel acato al gran proposito del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Destaco que el termino de la reconstruccion se debe tambien a los esfuerzos del director general de dicha compania china.
					
					Terminado el acto inaugural, los participantes pasaron revista a las obras exhibidas.
